review: Fire tv stick is great and works very well with no problems
author: Anthony Diaz

review: Love it. So far so good. Easy set up and excellent picture quality due to the HDMI plugin.
author: J. Martone "Crappy Dime"

review: OMG, WHY did I wait so long???
author: Margaret M. Grayson

review: I absolutely love my fire stick because I am a PRIME member. IF you are a prime user this little stick is amazing. I have access to all my prime content as well as normal streaming apps. I have noticed that my Netflix app is not 100% all the time but it only stalls maybe for a few seconds every 3 hour which is probably due to my internet speed more than anything. Would definitely recommend for PRIME users.
author: Amazon Customer

review: More than I expected!  Love it!
author: Jon Bellman
